doc.title: Wenn die Mondblume singt
doc.plot: After 25 Year in exile, Faruk Hosseini, a young journalist and filmmaker, visits his country for the first time, after he left in the early eighties. It is a personal trip through Kabul where Hosseini meets other exile-afghans and citizens, who stood there during the wars. His optimistic view and his interview partners show an image of Afghanistan besides the news-angles. Hosseini shows pride, hope and the still existing positivity in a region of destruction.
